room_title: Escape room "Party @ Grandma’s House" by MindBreak in St. Louis
review: Great activity to do with teenagers. We really enjoyed this escape room. It was challenging and fun.

room_title: Escape room "Party @ Grandma’s House" by MindBreak in St. Louis
review: I have been to almost every escape room in the area! This one was the most unique. The owner was there and was so welcoming. You can tell she put her heart into her rooms! It had a very personal feel and we needed strategies it wasn't like I "had seen it all". Can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "Party @ Grandma’s House" by MindBreak in St. Louis
review: The best escape room I've been to in a long time. The owner Terri is of the sweetest people, her hospitality was amazing. The room we went into was well thought out and well planned. It's super creative and challenging. I would definitely recommend this escape room to anyone.
